thread.section_title: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ingram's Water & Air Equipment | ingramswaterandair.com
thread.title: Carl Mcgraw
thread.title_full: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment reviewed by Carl Mcgraw

author: Carl Mcgraw
title: Carl Mcgraw
text: I ordered the MrCool DIY 24K minisplit. Staff answered my questions. Tracking number when shipped. Fast!! Minisplit was fairly easy to install and is working excellently. In fact, it kept my place warm last night when the outside temp was 14f. I plan on ordering another unit from Ingram's in a few weeks for my guest house
